program: Master of Arts in Human Kinetics (MAHK)
notes: You must enroll in THM7999 and APA6997 each term until completed.

Fall: APA6302 or APA6303 | Qualitative or Quantitative Research Methods in Sport, Physical Activity and Health
APA6104 or APA6105 or APA6110 or APA6111 | Selected Topics in Sport, Physical Activity and Health: Sociocultural Studies / Psychology and Pedagogy / Management / Leisure Studies
Winter: APA6100 or APA6101 | Qualitative or Quantitative Data Analysis in Sport, Physical Activity and Health
